```{r setup}
library(magrittr)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
cont <- 
  contract() %>% 
  term_start(
    as.Date("2000/01/01"), 
    id = "Purchase date",
    payment = 1000,
    receipt = 50,
    consideration = 0.06 * par_vale()
    )

View(cont)

```
